cast.overview: A heroic fire captain values dedication and service to others above all else, but the most important partnership in his life, his marriage, is about to go up in smoke.
cast.title: Fireproof

crew.overview: A heroic fire captain values dedication and service to others above all else, but the most important partnership in his life, his marriage, is about to go up in smoke.
crew.title: Fireproof

crew.overview: A small suburban town receives a visit from a castaway unfinished science experiment named Edward.
crew.title: Edward Scissorhands

details.biography:
Rob Whitehurst is a retired production sound recordist from Tampa, Florida.

Studying music from a young age, lead Rob into recording live concerts for radio broadcast. This then opened the door to work around the world as a production sound mixer for film and television.

Television and film credits include COPS, America's Most Wanted, Ghost Stories, NFL Full Contact, Oprah, Dr. Phil, Extreme Makeover: Home Edition, The Biggest Loser, The Apprentice: Martha Stewart, The Tonight Show with Jay Leno, 60 Minutes, Facing The Giants, Fireproof, Courageous, and multiple programs for NBC, CBS, ABC, FOX, PBS, National Geographic, MSNBC, NFL Films, MTV, BBC etc.
details.name: Rob Whitehurst
